dal.table
Class PersonTable

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.netspective.sparx.xif.dal.AbstractTable
        |
        +--dal.table.PersonTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Default, Table
public class PersonTable
extends AbstractTable
implements Default

Represents the Person table.

Some relevant facts about this class:

  • It represents the Person in the database.
  • It has 15 columns, all of which are represented as Column class instances as protected member variables and have public getter methods.
  • Wrappers are provided around the createRow() and createRows() methods to allow typed retrieval of the PersonRow and PersonRows objects.
  • The getPersonByPersonId() method is provided to retrieve a single row by the primary key
